Constituent.Name: Phosphorus
Constituent.Description: 2002 Total Phosphorus Model for the Mississippi Atchafalaya Basin

Source.Name: Waste Water Treatment Plants
Source.Description: Phosphorus from Waste Water Treatment Plants 2002, kg (PCS)

Source.Name: Loess Soils
Source.Description: Phosphorus from Deeply Weathered Loess Soils

CommonTerms.Term:
Each model has different sources that the modeler has determined to be statistically significant. Choose a source from the list to present data only from that source. This model contains these sources:
All Not really a separate source, it just tallies all the sources together. Reported in kg. Waste Water Treatment Plants Phosphorus from Waste Water Treatment Plants 2002, kg (PCS). Manure (total) Phosphorus from Manure 2002, kg. Fertilizers (farm) Phosphorus from Farm Fertilizers 2002, kg. Urban Areas Urban and Developed Land, 2001 NLCD. Forest and Wetland Areas Forest and Wetland Areas, 2001 NLCD. Channel Erosion Phosphorus from Channel Erosion. Loess Soils Phosphorus from Deeply Weathered Loess Soils.
